name: SunShine Amaterasu
text:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "SunShine" monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 "SunShine" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but its effects are negated for the rest of the turn. You can send this card from the field to the GY; banish 1 card from your opponent's hand (at random). If this card is sent to the GY: You can destroy 1 card your opponent controls. If this card is in the GY, except the turn it was sent there, you can banish 1 Tuner monster and 1 or more non-Tuner monsters whose total levels equal 8; Special Summon this card from the GY. You can only use each effect of "SunShine Amaterasu'' once per turn.
